alert.note: Alert for Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 19 at 2:53PM MDT until May 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mountain snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 15 inches possible. * WHERE...Snowy Mountain Range. * WHEN...9 PM MDT this evening until noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Mountain travel may be difficult or impossible due to icy, snow packed roads and low visibilities in falling and blowing snow. Outdoor recreation may be especially hazardous to those caught unprepared for severe winter conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
